page.title: 01 CARSPHAIRN AND AREA
page.content: {VILLAGE}Carsphairn is a small village in the hills to the North of the Stewartry of Kirkcudbright. The present {population}is about 62.Most of the houses are single storey stone buildings. The{Lagwyne Hall}is used for many activities in the community. {AMENITIES}Within the village there is a{shop, }a{restaurant,}an{hotel,}and a {post office.}A{bus}runs twice daily through the village between Ayr and Castle Douglas.There is also a parish {church}where there is a service held every Sunday at 10.30am. {INDUSTRY}The main industries in the area are Forestry and Farming. {RECREATION}Trout fishing in the River Deugh and walking on the nearby hills are possible. {LANDSCAPE}The surrounding area is a mixture of hill farms and coniferous forest.
